Desc.entry: Locally based tenants association, covering approximately 500 dwellings and 1500 residents on the Hanover Estate. Works to improve the social, physical and housing environment. Hosts public internet access via UK Online from November 2010 (Tel Linsey on 273 9967 for details). Also has a Kids Funday in August and coach trips in June and August.

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 3
